phrases: I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
He is Sunakawa Makoto, a friend of mine.
And that is my girlfriend, Yamato.
You must be the first-year, Gouda Takeo.
We need to talk to you.
But you have no idea what help you will be giving.
Men are bowing down to me.
So what did you need help with?
At the end of this month,
our judo club will participate in the Shuu-Bi Match.
where we compete with Bianka High School,
We must secure victory in the 10th match for glory!
There is even a superstition that the years we lose the match,
we will not make it to nationals!
It is pretty much our Battle of Mt. Tennou!
It is a team competition where we need to win three out of five matches,
and we have no one to take his place.
that you were not able to take it in, right?
So I just have to try to win the match happening in a month?
Oh, guess you got the gist of it.
See you at morning practice tomorrow!
It is amazing that they would ask you for help.
I did not know you did judo, Takeo-kun.
Up till the end of junior high.
You even competed in the nationals.
Why did you stop in high school?
No, there are many more who are stronger than I!
I am sure you would rank pretty high,
if anyone ranked all humanity in order of their strength.
I wonder where you would place...
I have got a way to go.
After all, there are people like Karelin.
That is good and all, but...
If you are going to train for the match,
does not that mean you will not be able to see Yamato-san
It is great that they would come to you for help.
Besides, I want to see you do judo.
If you really want to see me,
I will be cheering you on, so I will be fine.
I know you are looking out for me!
Sorry I came without telling you.
I thought about keeping it a secret,
but I peeked into your practice session.
I can make other things, see?
I got a little too into it this morning and made a ton.
I might have made too much.
But you should not come here again.
If anything were to happen to Yamato,
She made all these different kinds
with those tiny hands of hers.
The rice must have been piping hot, too.
I thought you might get hungry.
I am going to give it everything I have got!
Today, there are lots of flowers blooming at school.
I only know the name of flowers like tulips and stuff,
but I would like to go with you to a botanical garden sometime.
Take, you are perfect for this.
I cannot see any stars today.
I wonder if it is going to rain tomorrow.
Takeo-kun, do not forget to take an umbrella.
What kind of umbrella do you have?
Hey, that is a beach umbrella, is not it?
I have always wondered about that.
Takeo-kun, do not get hurt, okay?
I am going to make a wish right now.
I can feel the good vibes!
I found myself baking a ton when I was thinking about Takeo-kun.
Oh, sorry, I guess it might feel like leftovers.
Well, why not just give them to Takeo?
He would not have a problem eating them all, would he?
I do not know if Takeo-kun likes me anymore.
But he told me not to come.
It might be because I got ahead of myself and showed up with food!
No, I think it is just a misunderstanding or you are overthinking it.
He totally is not the type of guy to get mad about stuff like that.
Now that I am calmer about it, I see it now.
I do not think you have to work yourself up over this.
It is the first time I have fallen for anyone.
Meeting Takeo-kun was the first time
that I felt this rush coming up from the bottom of my heart, you know?
That is when I realized it is what love's like.
Every day, I am excited about him and cannot stop smiling.
Every time I see him, I know I love him.
Oh, Takeo was my first friend, too.
Having him as your first is pretty intense, huh?
I love him so much, I even creep myself out!
I want to calm down already!
I wonder if it will ever calm down...
I have been friends with him for over a decade,
but he has not bored me yet.
What am I going to do?
Maybe I will feel nervous for the rest of my life!
Takeo'd feel that way with you for the rest of his life, too.
I really want to see him.
Why do not you wait for him?
No, seeing him will only make me want to see him more often.
I will just have to hold back!
I do not want to get in his way!
I do not think he is the type to think that way, but okay.
When he was training, Takeo-kun was so cool.
He will be even cooler at the actual match.
I have seen him at a match
He is like a ball of concentration.
He is the type that never misses a penalty kick
I wonder if I will be okay!
If you draw a line between that star and the other star,
So it is like the Takeo constellation.
Oh, those seven stars look just like Takeo-kun when he was doing a shoulder throw!
And those over there are when he saved me on the train.
I think you can see anything you want in the stars.
Oh, that one is when Takeo-kun escaped from the fire!
I am starting to see him in the stars, too.
Takeo-kun, please spar with me next.
Gouda, you are doing this for us...
It is true that I want to give everything I have to this,
given that a man bowed his head to me
and I have agreed to help.
But it is more because Yamato wished me good luck.
I have not heard her voice in a while.
It is the first time I have gone this long without talking to her.
I just wanted to hear your voice.
Oh, your match is tomorrow, right?
I am looking forward to it.
The match will be 6 PM tomorrow, at the arena.
She said she made too much when she was thinking about you.
Why did not she bring them to me?
She said she did not want to bother you.
Yamato-san was almost passing out from excitement about the match.
She did not say anything like that.
She just wished me good luck.
I want you watching from up close.
He is a buddy of mine.
In elementary school, we went to the same dojo.
You were stronger than me until junior high,
but after starting high school, I have been competing at the national level.
I will not lose to some guy who is been fooling around with a girlfriend.
Takeo-kun, I think I will go watch from the side.
I will be fine outside, too...
Watch right in the middle of the room, Yamato.
The path of judo is not paved in a single day.
Takeo's been led astray, wasting his time on romance.
What does it mean to be strong?
Everything you make tastes so heartfelt.
Yeah, I will fight twice as hard in your stead.
The next match will be decisive.
Shuuei High School's Team Champion, Gouda Takeo, forward!
Bianka High School's Team Champion, Iwayama Tsuyoshi!
You might be wanting to impress your girlfriend,
but I will not let you.
You are the best in the prefecture!
What does it mean to be strong?
There is no way I will lose to Takeo, now that he is lost his bark!
This is a match to remember!
There is no way I will lose.
There is no way I will lose!
Well, that was awesome to watch, even for a guy.
It is because you were there, cheering me on.
Takeo, Yamato-san's already about to pass out.
What does it mean to be strong?
But, Yamato, I want to become a great man.
When you draw a line between that star and the other,
it is the one with you laughing.
And that is the one where you are doing a shoulder throw.
I am surprised you remember all of them.
To me, they look like Yamato.
If you connect that star and the other one...
It is right next to your constellation!
That one's the constellation for the macarons you made.
That one's for you when we first met.
Oh, it is next to yours again!
Yamato, let us see each other again tomorrow,
That one's for you when you pushed the beam with me.
and talk about all the little things, until the sun goes down.
